page.title: 10A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: { My name is{CHRISTOPHER .}I live on WHITEHALL ROAD, NORWICH. I wake at 7.30a.m. but I get up at 8.00. I wear school uniform, which for boys is black trousers, a white shirt and a dark green and black diagonal striped tie. My breakfast usually consists of a bowl of cereal and a glass of orange juice. I make my packed lunch of yoghurt, an apple and a sandwich.I leave for school at 8.45. School starts at 9.00a.m. We have an { {ASSEMBLY}and as our school is Christian we sing hymns and say prayers. We have all sorts of lessons, including {SCIENCE, FRENCH and {HOMECRAFT.}School ends at 3.15p.m. After my evening meal I play until my bedtime at about 9.00p.m.
